title: Do color models really make a difference?
proctitle: CHI '96: Proceedings of the SIGCHI Conference on Human Factors in Computing Systems

authors.name: Sarah Douglas
authors.institution: Department of Computer Science, University of Oregon, Eugene, OR

authors.name: Ted Kirkpatrick
